Articles.Content: I've been searching EVERYWHERE and i can't seem to find it! Anyone know how to either make the 0.25 version work or have the download for the 0.90 version?

Here you go: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial

Did you try that one already? Working mostly fine on my install

Edit: it relies on a plugin called SmokeScreen though, which you need the 0.90 update for.
I can't find the 0.90 smokescreen, you wouldn't happen to have that too would you?

I can't find the 0.90 smokescreen, you wouldn't happen to have that too would you?

Here you go http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71630-0-90-SmokeScreen-2-5-3-Extended-FX-plugin-%28Dec-12%29

EDIT- And It don't need the plugin for the flame FX just the smoke.
